original_title: Young and Handsome: A Night with Jeff Garlin
overview: Jeff Garlin, known by many for his role as Jeff Greene on Curb Your Enthusiasm, returns to his hometown and his comedy roots for his first hour-long special. He performs to a sold-out crowd at the historic Second City Theatre in Chicago. Garlin is a wonderful storyteller and enjoys the kind of comedy where if anyone looks stupid, itâ€™s him. So sit back, lie down or stand up if you want for a night with Jeff Garlin.
title: Young and Handsome: A Night with Jeff Garlin
